name: Kingdom of Memories
description:
Kingdom Memories has been made in a Game Jam in 48 hours made in Construct 3 !

CONTROLS : Directional arrows / SpaceBar

You embody Tiffany, a child that really cares about her grandfather, despite his memory losses. One day, she decides to go in the Kingdom of Memories to find photos from the past to help his grandfather recover his souvenirs.

CREDITS :

Justine Crepel - Main Graphics

Soline Carton - Graphics, Animation, Sounds

Yvain Audéon - Level Design, Game Design, Programming
